intro.title: I am Axel
intro.text:
Startup enthusiast and tech problem-solver with over 6 years of experience:

I turn complex challenges into scalable solutions. From health-tech to e-commerce, I've leveraged Go, React, and Flutter to craft innovative MVPs that rapidly propel startups from concept to market.

My entrepreneurial spirit and years in the field drive me to do more than just write code â€” I solve real business problems. Currently, I'm diving deep into AI development to give your applications an intelligence boost.

Ready to bring your startup idea to life with experience-driven innovation and lightning-fast MVP strategies?

features.title: My Craft
features.text: With creativity and code I bring your vision to life.

one.title: Multi-Platform Expert
one.text: Full-Stack Web, native Mobile Apps and Desktop Applications: Tailored solutions for every platform.

two.title: Full-Cycle Developer
two.text: From strategic planning through development and testing to deployment and beyond.

end.title: End
end.text: I don't just write code; I solve problems. Whether it's a short-term project or a long-term vision, I'm here to turn your ideas into reality with creativity, expertise, and a dash of nerd enthusiasm.
